ModulePrefs.title: Gadget Testage
ModulePrefs.description: Gadget permettant d'afficher des graphiques en fonction d'un fichier Spreadsheet
ModulePrefs.author: EL3GOST

Module.Content:
<iframe id="inlineFrameExample"
    title="Inline Frame Example"
    width="300"
    height="200"
    src="https://www.openstreetmap.org/export/embed.html?bbox=-0.004017949104309083%2C51.47612752641776%2C0.00030577182769775396%2C51.478569861898606&layer=mapnik">
</iframe>

 <script type="text/javascript">
 function adjust() {
   console.log('azeaze');
   gadgets.window.adjustHeight();
   console.log("Tazeaz");
}
    gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(adjust);

</script>
